entry.title: One paper accepted to WACV 2024
entry.content: Our paper, “iBARLE: imBalance-Aware Room Layout Estimation”, was accepted to IEEE/CVF Winter Conference on Applications of Computer Vision (WACV).
entry.summary: Our paper, “iBARLE: imBalance-Aware Room Layout Estimation”, was accepted to IEEE/CVF Winter Conference on Applications of Computer Vision (WACV).

entry.title: One paper accepted to CVPR 2022
entry.content: Our paper, “LASER: LAtent SpacE Rendering for 2D Visual Localization”, was accepted to Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) and selected for full oral presentation at the conference.
entry.summary: Our paper, “LASER: LAtent SpacE Rendering for 2D Visual Localization”, was accepted to Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) and selected for full oral presentation at the conference.

entry.title: One paper accepted to JACR
entry.content: Our paper, “Inconsistent AI: Deep learning models for breast cancer fail to deliver after closer inspection”, was accepted to the Journal of the American College of Radiology (impact factor: 3.785).
entry.summary: Our paper, “Inconsistent AI: Deep learning models for breast cancer fail to deliver after closer inspection”, was accepted to the Journal of the American College of Radiology (impact factor: 3.785).

entry.title: One paper accepted to WACV 2019
entry.content: Our paper, “A Generative Model of Worldwide Facial Appearance”, was accepted to WACV 2019.
entry.summary: Our paper, “A Generative Model of Worldwide Facial Appearance”, was accepted to WACV 2019.

entry.title: One paper accepted to CVPR 2017
entry.content: Our paper, “Predicting Ground-Level Scene Layout from Aerial Imagery”, was accepted to CVPR 2017.
entry.summary: Our paper, “Predicting Ground-Level Scene Layout from Aerial Imagery”, was accepted to CVPR 2017.
